text:
Under a sea of cosmic pinholes,
Tracing shapes through the ink;

Meaning onto the meaningless.
The jagged glass of the ocean reflecting space and the infinite quiet.

Every slight movement in my body sways the boat; scattering minute aberrations out from the hull.
Meaningless waveforms, signalling nothing to nothing and nobody.
Some part of me is drawn downwards, out of this vessel - away from the deep nothingness above me. Into the infinity below, where I might find some long-sunk piece of myself.
But I just cannot follow it.
